title: SP7 "Episode of Merry: The Tale of One More Friend"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Merī: Mō Hitori no Nakama no Monogatari" (Japanese:エピソードオブメリー ～もうひとりの仲間の物語～) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka August 24, 2013(2013-08-24) 106 minutes
transformers_text: SP 7 Episode of Merry The Tale of One More Friend 4 Transliteration Ep is do o bu Mer M Hit ori no Na kama no Mono g atari Japanese Katsumi To koro Hiro hi ko Kami saka August 24 2013 2013 08 24 106 minutes An abridged remake of the Water 7 and Eni es Lobby story arcs n 4 from Luffy and Us opp's fight and Robin's disappearance to the crew's battle against CP 9 to get Robin back and the crew's final farewell to the ship
